items.title: Justin Trudeau says he'll resign as prime minister of Canada
items.description: The development comes a month after Canada's deputy prime minister, Chrystia Freeland, resigned suddenly from Trudeau's cabinet.

items.title: Major winter storm covers 13 states, breaking snowfall records as it moves east
items.description: A major winter storm that has been breaking snowfall records in the Midwest is moving east, bringing with it a heavy mix of snow and ice.
